reviews.customers_say: Customers like the dress's style, particularly how the sparkles match well with silver or gold, and find it comfortable and of good quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ADORABLE and comfy!
items.body: This dress was such a hit on a â€œstarsâ€ themed night out! I would recommend some kind of shape wear/shorts, as it is quite short, and also the fabric hugs a bit form fitting. A strapless bra as well, for the less endowed, like me :) Not as sparkly as I expected, but still definitely did the job. The sleeves were comfortable, although they did slide down a tad. I expected them to be a bit longer, but it wasnâ€™t a big deal at all. For reference: Height: 5â€™5 Weight: 135 Waist: 30â€ Hips: 39â€ Body type: long torso, low waist, smaller chest Overall, it was good quality and definitely worth the money. I canâ€™t wait to wear it again! Read more
items.author: Adri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THE DRESS!!!
items.body: The dress is absolutely beautiful! It fit my body perfectly, just the way I wanted it to! It made the perfect dress for my birthday outting that I had in March. Although the sleeves are thin/mesh I was glad they were there to keep the chilly March wind from making me too cold. And the dress itself has layers that kept me for the most part warm during my night out. I would so buy this again! Get the dress ladies!! ðŸ–¤ðŸ–¤ Read more
items.author: Cathy T.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So so cute but better looking with out the sleeves
items.body: Extremely cute but I think it looks wayyyy better with out the sleeves. I have short arms and like the picture the sleeves are very long. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of compliments! Comfortable and sexy!
items.body: Good quality, light and breathable. I ordered a L and received an XL, however, it still fit well. Was very flattering for a night out in Miami! ðŸŒ´ Read more
items.author: Victoria McKaba

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars WAY too small and uncomfortable
items.body: I got it for my birthday dinner. I ordered a size 2-4 and it was WAY too small. It was the recommended size, but I the chest cups looked like they were for a babydoll. It was more for an A cup and someone who is TINY. It was incredibly tight overall and I didnâ€™t even put it on the whole way (because I feared I would rip it). The arm sleeves were incredibly tight and uncomfortable as well. It was cute but seemed at least 2+ sizes too small. Read more
items.author: Crystal Lynn Mack

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORG dress!
items.body: This dress is Gorgeous!! I got size medium Iâ€™m 5â€™2 130lbs and it fit slightly longer than I like so I tapered it to be higher. Good quality and sleeves never slipped down! But it!!!! Read more
items.author: Francheska

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not made well
items.author: miyoko kogita

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, Black, Solid Brown, Solid Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
